t = map(int, raw_input().split())
while t[0]:
    n = map(int, raw_input().split())
    a = map(int, raw_input().split())
    a.sort()
    soln = []
    for i in range(0, n[0]/2):
	soln.append(a[i])
	soln.append(a[n[0]-1-i])
    if n[0]%2:
	soln.append(a[i+1])
    l = len(soln)
    for i in range(0, l-1):
	print soln[i],
    print soln[l-1]
    t[0] = t[0] - 1
